content.text: Trial 3/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a 3D groove structure with the user's gaze indicated by a red circle on a slanted section of the groove. The groove direction in this area appears to be diagonal, oriented from top left to bottom right.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [175.0, 0.0, 0.0],
    [0.0, 175.0, 0.0],
    [0.0, 0.0, 100.0]
  ]
}
```
